title: Famous Paintings Recall
description: Match famous paintings to their artists and museums

questions.question: Leonardo da Vinci's 'Mona Lisa' is housed in which museum?

'The Persistence of Memory,' featuring melting clocks, was painted by which artist?
Sandro Botticelli's 'The Birth of Venus' can be seen in which Italian museum?
Who painted 'Girl with a Pearl Earring,' sometimes called the 'Mona Lisa of the North'?
Edvard Munch's 'The Scream' depicts a figure on a bridge. In which country was Munch born?
Which artist painted 'Water Lilies,' a series of approximately 250 oil paintings?
Rembrandt's 'The Night Watch' is displayed in which museum?
'Guernica,' a powerful anti-war painting, was created by which artist in response to the Spanish Civil War?
Which American artist is famous for painting 'American Gothic,' showing a farmer and his daughter?
Gustav Klimt's shimmering gold painting 'The Kiss' is housed in which city's museum?
Who painted 'Nighthawks,' depicting people in a late-night diner?
Michelangelo's 'The Creation of Adam' is painted on the ceiling of which famous building?
Which Dutch master painted 'The Milkmaid,' showing a woman pouring milk from a jug?
James Abbott McNeill Whistler's famous painting of his mother is officially titled what?
options: Arrangement in Grey and Black No.1
Study in Grey: The Artist's Mother
